com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISCUIExtensionsPathProviderV2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIExtensionsEmptyPathProvider, SCUIOrgBasedExtnPathProvider

    public interface ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider
    This interface needs to be implemented if differential extensibility needs to be achieved with framework automatically picking up extension mashUps, JSlib and jsp files from specific path. Mashups will be picked from: 1. /extn/[PathIdentifier]/mashupxmls/incrementalmashups.xml 2. /extn/[PathIdentifier]/mashupxmls/overridemashups.xml 3. /extn/[PathIdentifier]/mashupxmls/additionalmashups.xml JSB will be picked from /extn/[PathIdentifier]/jsb/custom.jsb JSPs will be picked from /extn/[PathIdentifier]/a/path/name.jsp rgoyal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getExtnPathIdentifier(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method should return the path identifier under which the extensions will be available uiContext String
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getExtnPathIdentifierHierarchy(java.lang.String extnPathIdentifier, SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method should return a HashMap of the PathIdentifiers hierarchy, where (Key, Value) should be (PathIdetifier, ParentToPathIdentifier) Takes a parameter uiContext to figure out what the PathIdentifer is and make sure it is present the map before return extnPathIdentifier, uiContext HashMap[String, String]
      boolean isPathBasedExtnEnabled()
      This method returns the boolean to signify whether extensibility based on path identifiers is enabled.
